Reviews: Very very frustrating navigation This application is basically for viewing videos and videos only Which means the navigation going back and front becomes very vital but they never have thought about it for so long All I can do is go backwards 10 seconds that s it Very very bad I am removing my 5 star rating and bringing it to 1 star I won t revert back until they do something about this A UX engineer need to think about the end user experience on why and how a user watches a typical video and what he does often Perhaps adding 5 10 30 seconds front or back could solve this for now
